get.description: Get a single clip's full details

schema.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.name: clipId

schema.description: A unique identifier for a clip

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a clip

parameters.name: clipSlug

schema.description: The text identifier slug for a clip

parameters.description: The text identifier slug for a clip

parameters.name: language

schema.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.name: _data

schema.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$clipId.$clipSlug"

parameters.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$clipId.$clipSlug"

get.description: Get a paginated list of a studio's clips. Page size is fixed at 20, changing limit in url will not have any effect.

parameters.name: studioId

schema.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.description: A unique identifier for a studio

parameters.name: studioSlug

schema.description: The text identifier slug for a studio

parameters.description: The text identifier slug for a studio

parameters.name: language

schema.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.name: page

schema.description: Page number

parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: sort

schema.description: The sort order of the clip search results

parameters.description: The sort order of the clip search results

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search term to filter clip results by. If not provided url should omit '/search/' path param.

parameters.description: Search term to filter clip results by. If not provided url should omit '/search/' path param.

parameters.name: category

schema.description: The category ID to filter the search by. Setting the value to 0 will filter by all categories.

parameters.description: The category ID to filter the search by. Setting the value to 0 will filter by all categories.

parameters.name: _data

schema.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$studioSlug.$"

parameters.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).studio.$id_.$studioSlug.$"

parameters.name: onlyClips

schema.description: Whether to return only the studio's clips. If omitted, the response will include studio details. Note: passing any value to this param will be interpreted as true, so passing 'false' as no effect

parameters.description: Whether to return only the studio's clips. If omitted, the response will include studio details. Note: passing any value to this param will be interpreted as true, so passing 'false' as no effect

get.description: Get all category details by ID including top stores and clips, as well as new and trending clips

parameters.name: language

schema.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.name: category

schema.description: C4S category ID

parameters.description: C4S category ID

parameters.name: pill

schema.description: Sexual preference option(s) joined by underscores. 1 (ID: Straight), 2 (ID: Gay), 3 (ID: Lesbian), 4 (ID: Bisexual), 5 (ID: Trans)

parameters.description: Sexual preference option(s) joined by underscores. 1 (ID: Straight), 2 (ID: Gay), 3 (ID: Lesbian), 4 (ID: Bisexual), 5 (ID: Trans)

parameters.name: _data

schema.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).clips.category.$id.($catName)"

parameters.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/($lang).clips.category.$id.($catName)"

get.description: Get additional category details for a category not returned by category details endpoint. Based on section parameter will return subsequent pages of top stores, top clips, or recently added related clips for this category.

parameters.name: section

schema.description: Determines what type of data is returned

parameters.description: Determines what type of data is returned

schema.description: The language of the returned data. If omitted, the language will be automatically determined by location of the request.

parameters.name: id

schema.description: C4S category ID

parameters.description: C4S category ID

parameters.name: page

schema.description: See more category info page number. Can only be 2 or 3.

parameters.description: See more category info page number. Can only be 2 or 3.

parameters.name: pill

schema.description: Sexual preference option(s) joined by underscores. 1 (ID: Straight), 2 (ID: Gay), 3 (ID: Lesbian), 4 (ID: Bisexual), 5 (ID: Trans)

parameters.description: Sexual preference option(s) joined by underscores. 1 (ID: Straight), 2 (ID: Gay), 3 (ID: Lesbian), 4 (ID: Bisexual), 5 (ID: Trans)

parameters.name: _data

schema.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/clips.category.seeMore"

parameters.description: Data loader param. Must be set to "routes/clips.category.seeMore"
